definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
at a distance of/distance/to be apart

sentences.english: The other end of each clamping sheet, which is different from the clamping flange, is provided with a bulge.
sentences.chinese: 另外该束环的另一端表面形成数个成等距间隔的卡槽。

sentences.english: Justified text is spaced out so that each line is of the same length.
sentences.chinese: 等距调整让每一行的横向长度一致。

sentences.english: It introduces a new kind of generating method of non-equidistant curves.
sentences.chinese: 提出了直纹面叶轮叶片非等距轮廓线的生成方法。

sentences.english: Sequential isometric contractions can be substituted for weight lifting.
sentences.chinese: 连续等距收缩可以取代举重。

sentences.english: The first question most people have about isometric exercises is what are they and so they work.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人对第一个问题是什么呢等距演习等工作。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new method of machining equidistant profile axes using numerically-controlled machine tool is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了在数控机床上铣削等距型面轴的新方法。

sentences.english: Cups of bottom border chisel three beast hoof foot, etc. Distance divide the work, is decorated with the line beasts.
sentences.chinese: 樽底边沿琢三个兽蹄足等距分工，并饰有兽面纹。

sentences.english: Keeps a good balance thanks to the equal interval fluting of lock pin and hook spanner.
sentences.chinese: 由于锁紧销和扳手槽的等距分布，平衡性好。

sentences.english: Finally, the offset curve was achieved by deleting global self-intersections.
sentences.chinese: 再在中间等距线中删除全局无效环得到等距线。

sentences.english: Finally, the offset curve was achieved by deleting global self-intersections.
sentences.chinese: 再在中间等距线中删除全局无效环得到等距线。

sentences.english: An unequal distance multigrid method is developed to solve the thermal elastohydrodynamic lubrication of line contact problem.
sentences.chinese: 使用不等距多重网格法求解了线接触热弹流润滑问题。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a new approach to construct offset surface.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种新的等距面构造方法。

sentences.english: In this paper a five-level PE model with unequal interval of vertical levels is -developed for rainfall prediction.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一个不等距五层原始方程降水预报模式。

sentences.english: The foresters spaced the seedlings out in rows.
sentences.chinese: 林务员把树苗一行行等距栽种。

sentences.english: Every contraction can be extended to a partial isometry.
sentences.chinese: 每一压缩算子能被扩张成一个部分等距算子。

sentences.english: The new building is a massive body that ends the rhythm of original facade, marked by four roughly equidistant buttresses.
sentences.chinese: 而原有的四个等距扶壁则为厚重的建筑增添一丝韵味。

definition: base (of a triangle)/base line/hem line (of skirt)
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
